alert.note: Alert for Boone; De Kalb; Kane; Lee; McHenry; Ogle; Winnebago (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 25 at 3:13AM CST until January 25 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. For this morning, wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For tonight, wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Illinois. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as few as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Frostbite can occur in as little as 30 minutes. Limit exposure outdoors and dress appropriately for the cold.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Boone; De Kalb; Kane; Lee; McHenry; Ogle; Winnebago
